name: Verbeeg Longstrider

trait.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
text: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The verbeeg's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
1/day each: animal messenger, fog cloud, freedom of movement, pass without trace, silence, water walk

action.name: Multiattack
text: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Sling
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (3d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

spells: animal messenger, fog cloud, freedom of movement, pass without trace, silence, water walk
description:
Longstriders
Some verbeeg worship gods of nature and help defend the natural world. These even-tempered verbeeg are called longstriders and are blessed with innate spellcasting abilities.
Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 311
